text: <@U06K2R98C> <@U026E0ZNR> I'm writing up a couple of docs for OMSI. One on Troubleshooting and one on First-Time Installation. Should these run through a design phase of some kind?
or maybe just pasting my copy into an Uncorked template?
i feel like the template is fine, especially because this will just be an internal doc. keep it simple
also when you feel like the docs are in a good place, feel free to send it over to me and iâ€™ll do a pass on editing to help out
